title: Projectile motion of object launched at an angle

content.question: An object is launched with the velocity <math alttext="v sub 0"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> shown. The horizontal and vertical components <math alttext="v sub x "><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="v sub y"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, respectively, of the initial velocity are also shown. If air resistance is negligible, which of the following best shows <math alttext="asub x "><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="a sub y"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>a</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> when the object reaches the highest point in its trajectory?

choices.label: The figure indicates that a sub x equals 0, and a sub y equals 0.
The figure indicates that a sub x equals 0, presents a downward pointing arrow labeled a sub y.
The figure presents an arrow pointing to the left labeled a sub x, and indicates that a sub y equals 0.
The figure presents an arrow pointing to the right labeled a sub x, and an arrow pointing down labeled a sub y.
The figure presents an arrow pointing to the right labeled a sub x, and indicates that a sub y equals 0.

content.answer: The figure indicates that a sub x equals 0, presents a downward pointing arrow labeled a sub y.
